result:
**Bug found**: datetime.date silently discards time components when adding timedelta, violating associativity. Bug report saved as `bug_report_datetime_date_timedelta_2025-08-18_04-50_9tns.md`.

The property-based testing revealed that `date + timedelta` silently truncates time components (hours, minutes, seconds), leading to `(date + td1) + td2 ≠ date + (td1 + td2)` when timedeltas contain time components. This breaks the mathematical property of associativity and can cause subtle bugs in date arithmetic.
